property.value: Will of the council - Starting with you, each player votes for death or torture. If death gets more votes, each opponent sacrifices a creature. If torture gets more votes or the vote is tied, each opponent loses 4 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Urborg, few things are less permanent than death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life.

property.value: "I write upon clean white parchment with a sharp quill and the blood of my students, divining their secrets." - Shauku, Endbringer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skip your draw step. Pay 1 life: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, you may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land. Aftershock deals 3 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every act of destruction has a repercussion." - Karn, silver golem

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Beetleback Chief enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether trained, ridden, or eaten, few goblin military innovations have rivaled the bug.

property.value: You destroy four lands you control, then target opponent destroys four lands they control. Then Burning of Xinye deals 4 damage to each creature.

property.value: You may reveal a sorcery card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. Exile Burning Wish.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She wished for a weapon, but not for the skill to wield it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to any target. Then that player or that permanent's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, they may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

property.value: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor

property.value: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you've got nothing, you might as well trade it for something else.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lead, follow, or run around like crazy.

property.value: Protection from blue (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything blue.) Whenever Goblin Piledriver attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

If the first player does, that player puts that card onto the battlefield and all other cards revealed this way into their graveyard.

property.value: Fading 7 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with seven fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Saproling Burst: Create a green Saproling creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on Saproling Burst." When Saproling Burst leaves the battlefield, destroy all tokens created with Saproling Burst. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He was born of the Mirari, thrust out of his homeland before he was even aware. Left without purpose or meaning, he found both in the pits.

property.value: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to one of your opponents, its controller may draw a card.

property.value: Flying Will of the council - When Magister of Worth enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for grace or condemnation. If grace gets more votes, each player returns each creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield. If condemnation gets more votes or the vote is tied, destroy all creatures other than Magister of Worth.

Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.value: Mana Vault doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap Mana Vault. At the beginning of your draw step, if Mana Vault is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Masticore unless you discard a card. {2}: Masticore deals 1 damage to target creature. {2}: Regenerate Masticore.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Memory Jar: Each player exiles all cards from their hand face down and draws seven cards. At the beginning of the next end step, each player discards their hand and returns to their hand each card they exiled this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nevinyrral's Disk enters the battlefield tapped. {1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Activated abilities of artifacts can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gerrard: "But it doesn't do anything!" Hanna: "No - it does nothing."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. {5}, {T}: Destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The scourge of Skyshroud is airborne once more." - Oracle en-Vec

property.name: Rules
property.value: Echo {3} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not every cage is made of bars.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a soot counter on Smokestack. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a permanent for each soot counter on Smokestack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lost to time is the artificer's art of trapping light from a distant star in a ring of purest gold.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A sphere pushes equally in all directions.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Flawed copies of relics from the Thran Empire, the su-chi were inherently unstable but provided useful knowledge for Tocasia's students.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Thopter Squadron enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Thopter Squadron: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Activate only as a sorcery. {1}, Sacrifice another Thopter: Put a +1/+1 counter on Thopter Squadron. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Time Vault enters the battlefield tapped. Time Vault doesn't untap during your untap step. If you would begin your turn while Time Vault is tapped, you may skip that turn instead. If you do, untap Time Vault. {T}: Take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, Sacrifice Triangle of War: Target creature you control fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Zhalfirin war triangle represents a trinity of might, faith, and guile.
